attributes.action: The Abolition of Driven Game Shooting.
attributes.additional_details:
Pick up a gun, take your dog and set yourself against the elements, the terrain and the wiles of your chosen quarry; that's hunting.
Stand at a pre-arranged spot and shoot game driven towards you by others; that's target practice.
In this country, hundreds of thousands of birds are bred for this bloody slaughter. Years ago, the sport of Clay Pigeon Shooting was born from public revulsion at the use of live Pigeons as targets. Please petition the Government to give this matter similar treatment
